message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket into one of the specified categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights. Given the mentions of annual leaves, timecards, and related issues, it clearly relates to HR/payroll or timekeeping systems. So, HR Support feels like the right choice. I'll format my response simply as a JSON object: {"category":"HR Support"} without any extra text.
